scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:dist: npm run clean:backend:dist && npm run clean:frontend:dist
scripts.clean:modules: npm run clean:backend:modules && npm run clean:frontend:modules
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean:dist && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
